net.edzard.kinetic

Class TextPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • net.edzard.kinetic.Node
        • net.edzard.kinetic.Shape
          • net.edzard.kinetic.TextPath

  • public class TextPath
extends Shape
    A text path shape. Used for writing text along a SVG path.
    Author:
    Ed
